org.mini2Dx.ecs.system

Class System<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ecs.system.System<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameSystem

    public abstract class System<T extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    A common class for implementing Systems as part of the Entity-Component-System pattern
